summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RV Service Desk MVP Phase 1. All core features are working correctly including terms gate, case management, search, chat panel, and theme toggle. The app successfully runs without DATABASE_URL using in-memory storage fallback.
passed_tests: Terms gate appears on first load and blocks interactions
Terms gate checkbox enables Accept button correctly
Terms acceptance is stored in localStorage and persists across reloads
Terms and Privacy modal opens from all links (sidebar, header, gate)
Terms modal displays full document content correctly
New Case button creates cases successfully (in-memory)
Case selection and deletion works properly
Search functionality works for case titles and content
Chat panel shows proper error when OPENAI_API_KEY is missing
Chat input and send button are properly disabled/enabled based on terms acceptance
Theme toggle switches between light and dark modes
All API endpoints return correct status codes and data
In-memory storage fallback works when no DATABASE_URL is provided
